spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.throw_up.guid: Launch chosen target into the sky
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.sword_dance.g: Summoning magical swords around the caster. After a short delay, the swords will fly toward the last hurt target and stab them
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.qigong_contro: Control the force of yin and yang, pulling in targets when casting and push them out with powerful force when the cast is done
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.bagua_array_c: Summon a Bagua Circle at designated area, damaging undead mob inside and give its owner Reversal Healing effect
Cast a unstoppable force dragon ahead the caster, deal damage to anything on its path, can break magic shield with a chance
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.jade_judgemen: Calling down an giant Jade Dao, deal a massive area of damage on impact
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.jiangshi_invo: Summon 3 fast and furious Jiangshi to aid in your battle
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.underworld_ai: Calling upon 4 Impermanence to verdict targets in a circle, apply slowness, blindness, darkness effect and damage them for 4 second. The damage will scale based on the lost health of the target, up to target's 40% max health
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.punishing_hea: Summon a Jade Executioner, a great warrior that will behead anything that's against you or the Celestial Court
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.drapes_of_ref: Create a magical Jade Drape, deflect any projectile hit it
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.cloud_ride.gu: Summon a Magical Cloud that can be ridden on for a moment
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_catalyst: Firing soul skulls at targets, burns their souls on hit
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_burst.gu: Release a soul fire explosion at the caster position, damaging and burning souls of targets caught inside
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.spirit_challe: Extracting a part of target soul and then start the challenging. The soul can be attacked and an amount of the damage it took will be transferred to its owner. If the soul get destroyed or the owner try to run out of the challenging zone, they will get a debuff for a moment
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.bone_hands.gu: Summon Spirit Bone Hands from the ground, the hands will slam your targets if they are in range
Swing your weapon and strike down a deadly cut, the stronger your weapon, the more powerful the cut is
Summon a pack of Kitsune that will fight for you, inflict soulburn effect on their bite
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.revenant_of_h: Summon a loyal Spirit Samurai to protect you from threats
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.ashigaru_squa: Calling upon a squad of Spirit Ashigaru to aid in your battle
spell.iss_magicfromtheeast.phantom_charg: Summon a group of samurai horseman that will charge directly into your enemy formation
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_breaker.d: Deal %s extra soul damage on hit, apply Slowness when target's health lower than 60%%
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.spirit_crusher: Deal bonus soul damage based on %s%% of target's current health, apply Slowness and Weakness when target's health lower than 30%%
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.soulpiercer.de: Require mana to shoot. Damage depend on your Spirit Spell Power
Grants soulburn immunity and reduce soul damage taken by 80%
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.jade_pendant.d: Reflect 50% damage in a radius when being hit. The reflecting damage increase by 5% for per armor toughness you have
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.elemental_comm: Trigger by hitting enemy with a spell attack. Depend on your Symmetry Spell Power and the school of the previous spell attack, receive a buff and increase the damage of your next spell attacks related to the school
Holy: +10% cast time reduction & 4 max health
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.mist_boots.des: Trigger when being hit. Negate damage from that hit, apply True Invisibility and Mist Step effect for 6 second
enchantment.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_fl: Inflict Soulburn effect on spirit arrow hit.
enchantment.iss_magicfromtheeast.ghostly: Freeze targets on spirit arrow hit.
enchantment.iss_magicfromtheeast.spiritu: Increase the effective of Spirit Spell Power scaling on spirit arrow.
enchantment.iss_magicfromtheeast.wisely_: Reduce the mana cost per spirit arrow shot.
enchantment.iss_magicfromtheeast.inner_i: Increase Soul Breaker bonus soul damage dealt and Spirit Crusher percent health scaling.
effect.iss_magicfromtheeast.summon_cloud: Displays the duration remaining until your magical cloud fade away
effect.iss_magicfromtheeast.reversal_hea: Bypass incoming damage while heal yourself instead. Also gain 5% knock back resistance for per level of effect
effect.iss_magicfromtheeast.effect_banne: Increase attack damage and attack speed by 10%, increase damage of Fire magic attacks based on your Symmetry Spell Power
Increase knockback resistance by 10% and gain 4 armor point, increase damage of Nature magic attacks based on your Symmetry Spell Power
Increase movement speed and mana regeneration by 10%, increase damage of Lightning magic attacks based on your Symmetry Spell Power
Increase spell resistance and cooldown reduction by 10%, increase damage of Ice magic attacks based on your Symmetry Spell Power
Increase cast time reduction by 10% and gain 4 max health, increase damage of Holy magic attacks based on your Symmetry Spell Power
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.raw_jade.guide: Can be smelted very fast in Furnace but too fragile for blasting.
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.bottle_of_soul: Obtained by using empty bottle on soul fire, can be filled in Alchemist Cauldron.
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.crystallized_s: Obtained by soaking an Echo Shard in an Alchemist Cauldron full of Soul liquid.
item.iss_magicfromtheeast.repeating_cros: Need to be charged two time. Caution: this item is functional but not as its max, may appear some harmless issue while in use
advancements.iss_magicfromtheeast.spell_: Obtain a Ritual Orihon by trading with an Onmyoji
ui.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_extracting_: You can't extract the soul of this target!
ui.iss_magicfromtheeast.soulpiercer_not_: You have not enough mana to use this!
death.attack.symmetry_magic: Inside of %1$s's body was destroyed by %2$s's symmetry magic
death.attack.spirit_magic: %1$s's soul was burned by %2$s's spirit magic
death.attack.spirit_arrow: %1$s's soul was pierced by %2$s spirit arrows
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.bagua_: %1$s couldn't get out of %2$s's bagua circle
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.jade_j: %1$s was split into half by %2$s's jade dao
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_c: %2$s's soul skulls has burned %1$s's soul into dust
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.soul_b: %1$s's soul was blasted inside %2$s's spirit explosion
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.bone_h: %1$s was crushed into mash by %2$s's bone hands
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.kitsun: %1$s was shredded into small pieces by %2$s's kitsune
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.revena: %1$s wasn't escaped from the blade of %2$s's revenant
death.attack.iss_magicfromtheeast.phanto: %1$s was crushed under the march of %2$s's horseman
